comment._content: This mobilization was related to the Civil War and Revolution in Mexico, i.e.' here is Wikipedia article: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mexican_revolution ARMY REVOLTS, SEIZES MEXICO CITY; MADERO'S TROOPS HOLD THE PALACE; 300 ARE SLAIN IN THE FIRST CLASH; With 1,000 Loyal Men, Madero Resists Diaz's Call for Surrender. February 10, 1913, Monday Page 1, 152 words query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C05E6D71E3AE633A...
